data.price: 5. Dus waarlijk, na ongemak komen er weer betere tijden.
6. Waarlijk, na ongemak komen er weer betere tijden.

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.
